dmca.title: DMCA 1998 Violations on www.gamerzplanet.net
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Jeff Morris [mailto:Jeff.Morris@epicgames.com] 
Sent: Friday, February 11, 2005 12:47 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; The Planet Policy Enforcement
Subject: DMCA 1998 Violations on www.gamerzplanet.net
Importance: High

 

Person authorized to act on behalf of Epic Games: Jeff Morris

 

Infringed Copyrighted Work: Unreal Tournament 2004

 

Infringing Material: 

http://www.gamerzplanet.net/forums/attachment.php?attachmentid=12589

http://www.gamerzplanet.net/forums/attachment.php?attachmentid=1518

http://www.gamerzplanet.net/forums/attachment.php?attachmentid=1514

http://www.gamerzplanet.net/forums/attachment.php?attachmentid=11861

http://www.gamerzplanet.net/forums/attachment.php?attachmentid=11868

http://www.gamerzplanet.net/forums/attachment.php?attachmentid=11869

http://www.gamerzplanet.net/forums/attachment.php?attachmentid=11866

http://www.gamerzplanet.net/forums/attachment.php?attachmentid=11867

http://www.gamerzplanet.net/forums/attachment.php?attachmentid=11863

http://www.gamerzplanet.net/forums/attachment.php?attachmentid=11864

http://www.gamerzplanet.net/forums/attachment.php?attachmentid=11865

http://www.gamerzplanet.net/forums/attachment.php?attachmentid=5407

http://www.gamerzplanet.net/forums/attachment.php?attachmentid=10962

 

Jeff Morris

5511 Capital Center Drive, #675

Raleigh, NC 27606

919-854-0070 x3039

jeff@epicgames.com

 

Epic Games in no ways condones online hacking in its product, Unreal
Tournament 2004. Each of the files listed above facilitate multiplayer
hacking. As an employee of Epic Games I can attest that I have a good faith
belief that the use of the material in the manner complained of is not
authorized by the copyright owner. The Digital Millennium Copyright Act of
1998 (the "Act") provides that "no person shall circumvent a technological
measure that effectively controls access to a [protected] work."  17 U.S.C.
